title: Will Project Yasuo get the same loading screen frame as the others?
body:
I really hope he will, since all the other project skins have it and if he doesn't it will kinda feel like the others are getting more for the same amount of RP. That's pretty much all I'm concerned about, I just want Yasuo to have the frame all the other project skins are having

The loading screen frames -> http://www.newsoflegends.com/wp-content/uploads/2015/08/PROJECT_FirstStrike_Banner.jpg

replies.body:
Riot KateyKhaos
>Hey MrRado,

>We don't have plans to give PROJECT: Yasuo a First Strike border. As Vi King Vi mentioned, it would be unfair to those who already purchased the skin.
how is that unfair though? I consider it unfair for him not getting a border and I have the skin since it came out. I cant find the logic in it

[This](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/lV88FFnx-first-strike-project-yasuo-card?) is the thread I quoted.

>This would be unfair to players purchasing First Strike skins for 1350 RP at launch. 
>
>When Yasuo was first released, he was on sale for 975 RP, and a lot of players take advantage of the sale price. It'd be unfair that Yasuo players get a loading screen for 975 RP, when loading screens for the new PROJECT skins can only be obtained by paying full price.

Also
>We realize that newer players may not have had as many opportunities to collect skins/content (i.e. Judgment Kayle), We felt this was a good opportunity for both new and old players to engage with limited edition content.
Happy to help, K. Half of the threads I stumble across on the Boards could be answered with a quick link and quote.
It feels quite wrong though to leave him out of the skins event :S
Also  these skins will be going on sale for 975 as well so isnt it the same? I say give Yasuo a border for being the first PROJECT skin, it's just unfair to leave the original out.
that just sounds so pointless and petty lol, just give him the border.
Alright, thanks ill check it out

well if RIOT thinks that it's unfair for yasuo skin owners to get the border for 975 rp while the new skins cost 1350 rp, then why don't they just add a choice to buy the border for the remaining amount of rp in the shop? that would be fair for everyone i presume.
my bad i wrote it wrong lol why wouldn't  you give the first PROJECT skin the border
i have PROJECT:Yasuo and i was looking forward for the borders i mean why would you give the first PROJECT skin the border.
